message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
I'll meet you halfway, Alice. Let's try again.
I'll give you a bit more, Bob. Will this be enough to seal the deal?
I'll give you a bit more, Alice. But I think I can do better. Let's try again.
I'm getting closer to my target, Bob. Will you meet me in the middle this time?
I'm getting closer to my target too, Alice. Let's try to meet in the middle again.
I'm sticking to my guns, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll meet you halfway one more time. Let's try to make a deal.
